topic.title: HPE Helion Public Cloud Website Overview

body.p: Welcome to the HPE Helion Public Cloud website! We don't know about you, but whenever we go to a new site we're always thinking, "Yeah, okay; where the heck is everything?" That's the question this page is designed to answer; it contains an overview of the site as a whole, as well as some details on other web pages on the site where you can get the information you need. So ride along with us now:

section.title: Quicklinks
section.p: Rather than force you to read this whole page to find the info you need, here are a few links that maybe can help you out quickly:

ul.li: Knowledge Base: A collection of searchable information about HPE Helion Public Cloud. (This link is also in the navigation sidebar over on the right-hand side of every page.)

Forums: Where users get together and discuss issues with each other and some members of the HPE Helion Public Cloud team. (This link is also in the navigation sidebar over on the right-hand side of every page.)
Console: A link straight to the main HPE Helion Public Cloud console. Click on it and go!
Downloads: A listing of all the downloads currently available for HPE Helion Public Cloud.

section.title: Site Navigation
section.p: You may have already noticed that the site has multiple methods for navigating; we've included these so that you can choose the method that works best for you:

ul.li:
Next to the HPE Helion Public Cloud logo at the top of the page, there are three navigation pull-down menus and two quick links:
Products : Links to all the HPE Helion Public Cloud products (Compute, Object Storage, CDN, Block Storage, Relational Database, Identity Service)
Documentation : This here stuff you're currently reading; all the documentation available for the HPE Helion Public Cloud software (Compute, Object Storage, CDN, Block Storage, Identity Service, API, CLI, Bindings)
Community : Links to HPE Helion Public Cloud community resources (Forum, Knowledge Base, System Status)
Blog : A link to our blog, where you can read contributions from a number of different members of the HPE Helion Public Cloud team
Console : A link directly to the HPE Helion Public Cloud Console, so you can quickly access the HPE Helion Public Cloud utilities

On the right-hand side, you'll see a navigation panel that remains constant from page to page. This panel contains links to the places we think you'll want to access most often: the Site Map, the Knowledge Base, and the Forums.

Also on the right-hand side, when you are on certain pages lower in the documentation hierarchy, a second navigation bar appears to provide you with quick access different levels in that particular hierarchy. For example, when you surf to Bindings page, you can see a secondary navigation box that contains links to Overview page, and the two subordinate bindings pages on Ruby Fog and jclouds. Whatever page you are on is highlighted, to help you keep your place in the hierarchy.

section.title: Where to Start

ul.li: See the Getting Started Guide with HPE Helion Public Cloud Console to start navigating the web interface, activating your services, and getting up and running with the various available services
If you're already well versed in the cloud, feel free to just go straight to the HPE Helion Public Cloud Console and get going

section.p: So there you have it; a quick overview of what's available to you. If you have any comments or questions, please get in touch with us via the forums. Enjoy!
